Subject: What?
References: <3BE42AA5.8F003244@...>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Hey robo, sorry to waste your time with this. The council is trying to
decide a character limit, because inthe past, people have constantly
brought in new characters, carrying tomany, and then forgetting about
the older ones. We want to know what inyour opinion would be a good
number limit.

Somebody suggested 15, and no limit to the number in a faction. What
isyour thought?

We also think that to be a faction, someone needs to have a least three
different people in the group. What do you think about this?

Also, I hope to see you run for council. :)
